title: Cultivated Land for Sale
details:
On going Export/Local Agricultural project in Dunagaha(Gampaha District)

land extent 13.75A. 6.5A Sprinkler Irrigated Net Houses with foliage plants for local and export markets. Balance area is Coconut Plantation. 16Km to the Airport. 50km to Colombo. Good Road access. 3 Phase Electricity, Office, Stores, Packing House, Large Water Storage Pond, Two Deep wells with capacity of 10000L Per Hour. ..etc. Water suitable for Bottling. No issue of water even in the worst drought. Close to the proposed expansion road from Airport to the Kandy Express. Land has the infrastructure to grow other high valued food crops with technology.

At present Part of the land(Net Houses) is leased for Rs 200000 PM and the Tenant is happy to continue.
Please call Nimal Chandrasiri- 0773023646
Email: sanjayaiks@gmail.com
